text:
Quite a small place.

Went there two times for Sonny Angles. Overall it’s good. But the staffs are not well trained.

My first visit is like absolutely funny. (nov 5) The cashier staff don’t even bother to ask me about anything. He just scanned and tapped them. And put them in a bag. Like literally no words.

Please don’t work in retail and customer service. If you are not interested in it. Thank You.

Located in Vivocity Mall.
Wide selection of collectible toys- such as Bearbricks.
Always good to window shop at Action City to view their wide range of 1000% Bearbricks. Though this branch is much smaller than the outlet at Nee Ann City and MBS, there is a still a decent collection here.
The bearbricks are sold at a premium price.

Staff rudely forced me out of the store as I was browsing instead of politely telling me they are closing. Staff was a male wearing black specs and perhaps with man bun (can’t remember his hair well), short and ugly as well
The young girl with long curly on 12 Mar provided excellent service by helping mw check for a case of Monday Bruce series.
U love toys or small action figures? Come to this place. They have a lot..can add more for your collection.
